name: VR5 Going Dark
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Going Dark is a Virtual Reality Space Shooter developed in Unity3D using the Oculus Rift and Leap Motion. The player progresses through several levels completing missions which include shooting asteroids, collecting loot, killing enemies and annihilating bosses.

### Authors and Contributors
Allan Murillo (@noelmurillo15), Eva-Lotta Walhberg (@evalottaw), Clifford White (@CliffordWhite), Jeffrey Lamas (@jlamas16), Shaquille Simon (@shaqsimon19), Joe Fang(@Windagger) are all authors of this project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
